com.magnet.attributes.api

Interface AttributeContainer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeContainerWriteable

    public interface AttributeContainer
    General purpose container of attributes.

    The AttributeContainer is collection of key/value pairs that is governed by an AttributeSchema that includes metadata about each named attribute. Using the schema the container can convert attributes to and from a string representation. An AttributeContainer is a read-only interface that can be augmented with the AttributeContainerWriteable that provides the methods to add and update the value associated with keys when the object is allowed to be modified.

    See Also:
    AttributeSchema, AttributeContainerWriteable

    • Method Detail

      • containsKey

        boolean containsKey(String key)
        Determines if the specified attributes is currently set on this instance of the attribute container. A defaulted value will return true even if not explicitly set.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to check
        Returns:
        true if the key is set or defaulted and false if not.

      • isSparse

        boolean isSparse()
        Returns true if the Entity instance is sparsely populated such that not all of the properties in the container will retrieved from the backing store. If it is sparse then an update of the entity to the backing store will require that the individual attributes are applied to a freshly acquired copy of the entity.

      • getValue

        <T> T getValue(String key)
        Return the value associated with the specified key if it has been explicitly set or has a default value. Note that null is a legal value for an attribute and cannot be distinguished from the case in which the property has not been set or is null.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for which the value is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the value associated with the key or the default value.

      • getValueAsString

        String getValueAsString(String key)
        Returns the value associated with the specified key in the form of a String.
        Parameters:
        key - the key for which the value is to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the value in the form of a String.

      • getAttributes

        Map<String,Object> getAttributes()
        Return a copy of the contents of the AttributeContainer in the form of a Map
        Returns:
        a deep copy of the contents of the map.

      • getAttributeSchema

        AttributeSchema getAttributeSchema()
        Get the schema that is governing this map.
        Returns:
        the schema that controls the allowable value for this instance.

      • match

        boolean match(AttributeMatch query)
        Match the attributes in the container against the a match set of attribute names and regular expression string. The string value of each attributes is compared with the corresponding regular expression. If all of the expressions evaluate to true the the match evaluates to true.

      • compareTo

        List<AttributeDifference> compareTo(AttributeContainer toCompare)
        Returns the map of attributes to their values. Note that the values might be collections for multi-valued keys.
